title: DND application log files not found after upgrade
content:
After upgrading from version 2020.08 to 2020.11, the solution fails to generate DND application specific log files. 

Example: <NFS>/logging-volume/logs/dnd/<TENANT_ID>/<NAMESPACE>/…/csa.log

Cause

This issue occurs because the log path value in the log4j2.xml file isn't updated. 

Solution

  1. In the NFS share, go to <NFS>/logging-volume/data/dnd/<Tenant_ID>/sync/app-server/deployments/csa.war/WEB-INF/classes.
  2. Edit log4j2.xml.
    vi log4j2.xml
  3. Replace all JBoss occurrences with Tomcat as shown. For example, change the JBoss occurrence sys:jboss.server.log.dir to tomcat.server.log.dir. Similarly, change all the JBoss occurrences to Tomcat. 
  4. Save log4j2.xml. Wait a minute for the values to refresh. The solution will start generating change log files.
